org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet

Class ZToolPacketStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolPacketStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIntArrayInputStream

    public class ZToolPacketStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements IIntArrayInputStream
    Reads a packet from the input stream, verifies checksum and creates an XBeeResponse object
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Andrew Rapp, Alvaro Fides Valero

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBytesRead()
      Gets the number of bytes read (excluding escape bytes) Does not include any escape bytes
      int getChecksum() 
      int getFrameDataBytesRead()
      Returns number of bytes remaining, relative to the stated packet length (not including checksum).
      int getRemainingBytes()
      Number of bytes remaining to be read, including the checksum
      ZToolPacket parsePacket() 
      static ZToolPacket parsePacket(byte[] packet)
      Parses the incoming byte array of data and produces a ZToolPacket
      static ZToolPacket parsePacket(int[] packet)
      Parses the incoming int array of data and produces a ZToolPacket
      int read()
      TODO implement as class that extends inputstream?

      This method reads bytes from the underlying input stream and performs the following tasks: keeps track of how many bytes we've read, un-escapes bytes if necessary and verifies the checksum.

      • read

        public int read()
         throws java.io.IOException
        TODO implement as class that extends inputstream?

        This method reads bytes from the underlying input stream and performs the following tasks: keeps track of how many bytes we've read, un-escapes bytes if necessary and verifies the checksum.

        Specified by:
